sentence: The city councilmen refused the demonstrators a permit because _ feared violence.
The city councilmen refused the demonstrators a permit because _ advocated violence.
The trophy doesn't fit into the brown suitcase because _ is too large.
The trophy doesn't fit into the brown suitcase because _ is too small.
Joan made sure to thank Susan for all the help _ had recieved.
Joan made sure to thank Susan for all the help _ had given.
Paul tried to call George on the phone, but _ wasn't successful.
Paul tried to call George on the phone, but _ wasn't available.
The lawyer asked the witness a question, but _ was reluctant to repeat it.
The lawyer asked the witness a question, but _ was reluctant to answer it.
The delivery truck zoomed by the school bus because _ was going so fast.
The delivery truck zoomed by the school bus because _ was going so slow.
Frank felt vindicated when his longtime rival Bill revealed that _ was the winner of the competition.
Frank felt crushed when his longtime rival Bill revealed that _ was the winner of the competition.
The man couldn't lift his son because _ was so weak.
The man couldn't lift his son because _ was so heavy.
The large ball crashed right through the table because _ was made of steel.
The large ball crashed right through the table because _ was made of styrofoam.
John couldn't see the stage with Billy in front of him because _ is so short.
John couldn't see the stage with Billy in front of him because _ is so tall.
Tom threw his schoolbag down to Ray after _ reached the top of the stairs.
Tom threw his schoolbag down to Ray after _ reached the bottom of the stairs.
Although they ran at about the same speed, Sue beat Sally because _ had such a good start.
Although they ran at about the same speed, Sue beat Sally because _ had such a bad start.
The sculpture rolled off the shelf because _ wasn't anchored.
The sculpture rolled off the shelf because _ wasn't level.
Sam's drawing was hung just above Tina's and _ did look much better with another one below it.
Sam's drawing was hung just above Tina's and _ did look much better with another one above it.
